description: MongoDB (from "humongous") is a scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database written in C++. This package installs MongoDB as a Windows service and binds to localhost. Type mongo at a command prompt to use the interactive, administrative shell. A batch script, MongoRotateLogs.bat, is included for convenient log rotation.
summary: MongoDB (from "humongous") is a scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database written in C++.
author: 10gen
